page.title: 13Churches in West Farnham
page.content: In West Farnham there are 9 churches. These include Baptist ,Pentecostal, Congregationalist and Methodist churches. St. Andrews Parish church in the centre of Farnham is the largest church in Surrey. {St.Andrews Parish Church}is in the centre of Farnham and there is a good view of the tower (which was raised to its present height in 1866)from Church Passage.The tower leads out into the churchyard.The church still retains much of the character of the country in the centre of a town of over 32,000 people.The church was restored in 1959 and the earliest parts visible of the mid 12th century. {St. Peters Church}in School Hill was built in 1840. The Rev.Harry Dickens has been vicar for one year. A teenage club, health club,Brownies and wedding receptions are held at the church hall
